abstract: Brian Seibert reviews Kings of Salsa, dance performance choreographed by Roclan Gonzalez Chavez.
snippet: The Cuban choreographer Roclan González Chavez performed with his troupe in “Kings of Salsa” at the Lehman Center for the Performing Arts on Sunday.
